Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controller.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
Controller for managing user data and operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserController(UserDB userDB)
    Constructs a new UserController with a reference to the user database.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String nric)
      Gets a user by NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to get
      Returns:
      The user, or null if not found

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Gets all users in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all users

    • getUsersByRole

      Gets all users with a specific role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role to filter by
      Returns:
      A list of users with the specified role

      Returns:

      Returns:
      A list of all HDB managers

    • addApplicant

      public boolean addApplicant(String nric, String name, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus)
      Adds a new applicant to the system.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant
      name - The name of the applicant
      password - The password of the applicant
      age - The age of the applicant
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the applicant
      Returns:
      true if the applicant was added, false if NRIC already exists

    • addOfficer

      public boolean addOfficer(String nric, String name, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus)
      Adds a new HDB officer to the system.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the officer
      name - The name of the officer
      password - The password of the officer
      age - The age of the officer
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the officer
      Returns:
      true if the officer was added, false if NRIC already exists

    • addManager

      public boolean addManager(String nric, String name, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus)
      Adds a new HDB manager to the system.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the manager
      name - The name of the manager
      password - The password of the manager
      age - The age of the manager
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the manager
      Returns:
      true if the manager was added, false if NRIC already exists

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Updates an existing user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update
      Returns:
      true if the user was updated, false if NRIC not found

    • updateApplicantApplication

      public boolean updateApplicantApplication(String nric, String applicationId)
      Updates an applicant's current application.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant
      applicationId - The ID of the application, or null to clear
      Returns:
      true if the applicant was updated, false if NRIC not found

    • updateOfficerProject

      public boolean updateOfficerProject(String nric, String projectName)
      Updates an officer's handling project.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the officer
      projectName - The name of the project, or null to clear
      Returns:
      true if the officer was updated, false if NRIC not found

    • addManagerProject

      public boolean addManagerProject(String nric, String projectName)
      Adds a project to a manager's created projects list.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the manager
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      true if the project was added, false if NRIC not found

    • removeManagerProject

      public boolean removeManagerProject(String nric, String projectName)
      Removes a project from a manager's created projects list.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the manager
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      true if the project was removed, false if NRIC not found
